    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/110339</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Najstarejše civilizacije - anagram, križanka</string>
            <string language="en">Oldest civilizations - anagram, crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Älteste Zivilisationen - Anagramm, 
Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les civilisations les plus anciennes - anagramme, 
mots croisé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As civilizações as mais velhas - anagram, 
crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Più vecchie civilizzazioni - anagram, parole 
incrociate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παλαιότεροι πολιτισμοί - ανάγραμμα, σταυρόλεξο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las más viejas civilizaciones - anagram, 
crucigrama</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Anagrami in križanka sestavljeni iz besed povezanih z najstarejšimi civilizacijami.</string>
            <string language="en">Anagrams and crossword puzzle build of terms related to the oldest civilizations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">civilizacija</string>
            <string language="en">civilization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">maji</string>
            <string language="en">maya</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">križanka</string>
            <string language="en">crossword</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">anagram</string>
            <string language="en">anagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anagramme und Kreuzworträtselbau von 
Bezeichnungen standen auf den ältesten Zivilisationen in Verbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les anagrammes et la construction de jeu de mots 
croisé des limites ont associé aux civilisations les plus anciennes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os anagrams e a configuração do enigma de 
crossword dos termos relacionaram-se às civilizações as mais 
velhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I anagrams e la configurazione di cruciverba dei 
termini si sono riferiti alle più vecchie civilizzazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναγράμματα και κατασκευή γρίφων σταυρόλεξων των όρων
σχετικών με τους παλαιότερους πολιτισμούς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los anagrams y la estructura del crucigrama de 
términos se relacionaron con las más viejas civilizaciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zivilisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maya</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtsel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">civilisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">crossword</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">anagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">civilizzazione</string>

          <keyword>
